Class AbstractMeanClassifier

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.javaml.classification.AbstractClassifier
      net.sf.javaml.classification.AbstractMeanClassifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Classifier
Direct Known Subclasses:
MeanFeatureVotingClassifier, NearestMeanClassifier
public class AbstractMeanClassifier
extends AbstractClassifier

Abstract classifier class that is the parent of all classifiers that require the mean of each class as training.

Author:
Thomas Abeel (thomas@abeel.be)
